text: Rankumamofo amu'nompima ne'onse kantamima me'nefine, kumamofo amunompima kankamuma me'nege'za vahe'ma atruma nehazafinena, sondia vahe'mo'za karisifi mani'neza ame hu'za rugitagi'za vu'za e'za hugahaze. E'inama hanaza zamo'a kopasi'namo ruganani huteno, tavi tagi vazu huno vuno eno hiaza hugahaze.
